name: DotNetReactorTool
description: Find in cache or download a specific version of .NET Reactor
author: Eziriz

inputs.name: version
inputs.label: Version
inputs.helpMarkDown: The .NET Reactor version to download (if necessary) and use. Example: 5.9.5.0

inputs.name: license
inputs.label: License
inputs.helpMarkDown: .NET Reactor license file as base64 string.

inputs.name: reactorPath
inputs.label: A custom value for the DOTNETREACTORPATH environment variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: A custom value for the DOTNETREACTORPATH environment variable.

inputs.name: reactorBin
inputs.label: A custom value for the DOTNETREACTORBIN environment variable
inputs.helpMarkDown: A custom value for the DOTNETREACTORBIN environment variable.

messages.FailedToDownload: Failed to download .NET Reactor version %s. Verify that the version is valid and resolve any other issues. Error: %s
messages.TempDirNotSet: The 'Agent.TempDirectory' environment variable was expected to be set.
